Pacharo Mzembe bụ onye Australia na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ na-eme ihe nkiri, n'ọtụtụ usoro telivishọn na ihe nkiri.
Nne na nna Mzembe sitere na Malawi, mana a mụrụ ya na Zimbabwe
Ọ kwagara Australia mgbe ọ dị afọ isii na steeti Queensland.
Mzembe bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na National Institute of Dramatic Art (NIDA), mgbe a nabatara ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa

N'oge ọkọchị nke afọ 2012, o mere njem gafee Australia, nke o guzobere ma kpọọ Run of Awareness, na ebumnuche nke igosi enweghị nhata nke ohere agụmakwụkwọ maka ndị ntorobịa nwere nsogbu na Australia na gburugburu ụwa.
Mzembe malitere ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri, mana kemgbe ahụ, ọ pụtara n'ọtụtụ ọrụ telivishọn na ihe nkiri, gụnyere Monster Problems, Channel Nine Come the Habibs, Harrow na ABC, nakwa SBS's Safe Harbour

N'elu ikpo okwu, ọ kpara Martin Luther King Jr na The Mountaintop, yana ịpụta na Prize Fighter, nke o ritere Green Room Award ma họpụta ya maka Sydney Theatre nakwa Helpmann Awards maka ngosipụta ya nke onye agha bụbu nwa ghọrọ onye na-akụ ọkpọ.
Mzembe nwekwara mmasị n'ịkwado ndị ntorobịa na ime ihe nkiri.
